representation_information.name: Formal name: AES3-2003. AES standard for digital audio Digital input-output interfacing Serial transmission format for two-channel linearly represented digital audio data. Common name: AES3.
representation_information.description: Audio Engineering Society interface format for serial digital transmission of LPCM (Linear Pulse Code Modulated) sound. The data is sent in audio blocks, each of which is made up of 192 frames numbered 0 to 191. Each frame is divided in 2 subframes (or channels): A (left) and B (right). Each subframe contains the information for one single sample of the PCM audio.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
